name: B2BPitch
tag_list: business-development-network, networking, business-development, sales-leads, strategic-partnerships, partnerships, lead-generation, b2b, sales-pitch
overview: B2Bpitch.com is a service that helps businesses realize their needs before they are aware of them. B2Bpitch will recommend suppliers, vendors and clients based on a company’s industry, partners and current needs. The system recognizes the value chain of a business and identifies gaps and opportunities within it.
